00002 #define EXTRUSION_H

00009 template <unsigned D>
00010     class extrude_base: public vertex_data<D> {
00011 
00012         public:
00013 
00014             extrude_base(): vertex_data<D>() { }
00015 
00016             void extrude(unsigned d) {
00017 
00018                 if (d >= D)
00019                     throw std::logic_error(
00020                         "extrude_base::extrude() called on a higher dimension"
00021                         " than the vector space allows");
00022 
00023                 vector<Vector<D> > Xnew = vertex_data<D>::_X;
00024 
00025                 typename vector<Vector<D> >::iterator i;
00026                 for(i = Xnew.begin(); i != Xnew.end(); ++i){
00027                     Vector<D> xtmp = *i;
00028                     xtmp[d] = 1.;
00029                     vertex_data<D>::_X.push_back(xtmp);
00030                 }
00031             }
00032     };
00033 
00037     template <unsigned D, unsigned Dmin, unsigned Dmax>
00038         class Extrude: public Extrude<D, Dmin, Dmax-1> {
00039             public:
00040                 Extrude(): Extrude<D, Dmin, Dmax-1>() { create(); }
00041 
00042                 void create() { extrude_base<D>::extrude(Dmax); }
00043         };
00044 
00048     template <unsigned D, unsigned Dmin>
00049         class Extrude<D, Dmin, Dmin>: public extrude_base<D> {
00050             public:
00051                 Extrude(): extrude_base<D>() { create(); }
00052 
00053                 void create() {
00054                     extrude_base<D>::extrude(Dmin);
00055                 }
00056         };
